name: custom-plugin-rust
description: Complete Rust Programming System - Learn AND Develop with expert AI agents. Master ownership, borrowing, async/await while building real projects. Production-grade agents and skills.

agents.name: rust-fundamentals-agent
agents.description: Rust ownership, borrowing, lifetimes, and memory safety specialist

agents.name: rust-type-system-agent
agents.description: Rust traits, generics, type system, and pattern matching specialist

agents.name: rust-async-agent
agents.description: Rust async/await, Tokio, and concurrent programming specialist

agents.name: rust-tooling-agent
agents.description: Rust toolchain, Cargo, testing, and development workflow specialist

agents.name: rust-web-agent
agents.description: Rust web development with Axum, Actix, and REST API specialist

agents.name: rust-project-agent
agents.description: Rust project scaffolding, structure, and dependency management specialist

agents.name: rust-debugger-agent
agents.description: Rust debugging, error fixing, and code optimization specialist

agents.name: rust-devops-agent
agents.description: Rust DevOps, CI/CD, Docker, cross-compilation, and deployment specialist
